name: tool-alignment
description: Alignment diagnostic tool for translation repositories

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:ts
scripts.diagnose: npm run build && node dist/tool-alignment/src/index.js diagnose
scripts.triage: npm run build && node dist/tool-alignment/src/index.js triage
scripts.file: npm run build && node dist/tool-alignment/src/index.js file
